sources.title: Double Jeopardy (1955) Rod Cameron, Gale Robbins, Allison Hayes
sources.description: Double Jeopardy is a 1955 American crime film directed by R.G. Springsteen and starring Rod Cameron, Gale Robbins and Allison Hayes. It is also known by the alternative title of Crooked Ring and is not to be confused with the FILM NOlR Double Indemnity.    The film's art direction was by Carroll Clark.

sources.title: Double Jeopardy Republic
sources.description: Title: Double Jeopardy Summary: Lawyer Marc Hill helps clear the name of his girlfriend's father who is accused of murdering a man that was blackmailing him. Directed by: R.G. Springsteen Actors: Production Company: Republic Pictures (I) Release Date: 23 June 1955 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 Emmett Devery is being blackmailed by his former partner, Sam Baggott, who served a prison term years before on a shady business deal. Devery's daughter, Barbara, and his attorney, Marc Hill, in love with Barbara, know nothing about the situation. Baggott applies more blackmail-pressure and is killed by Jeff Calder, the boyfriend of cheating-wife Marge Baggott, who tried to double-cross Marge by getting the money himself. The police investigation of Baggott's murder leads to Devery, who admits that Baggott was blackmailing him but denies killing the extortionist. Hill and Barbara begin their own investigation.

sources.title: Double Jeopardy (1955) - Full Movie
